idiripath wu karunu kerehi salakilimath wu mahesthrathwaraya withthikaruwan thidenata 2013 janawari 22 da adhikaranaya hamuwe peni sitina lesata danwa nothisi nikuth karana lesath adala nadu edinata yali kandawana lesath niyoga kaleya. 2008 wasaredi mahanuwaradi madhyama palath pradhana amathi ha adhyapana amathi lesa da madhyama palath adhyapana adhyaksha lesada janadhipathi sambandhikarana adhyaksha lesa da swakiya dhuraya kelinma ho anyakarawa pawichchi kirimen pilimathalawa haramitigala shri dhirananda widyalaye palamu wasarata sisun athulath kirimata ehi widuhalpathiwarayawa pelambaimen ayuthu sahagatha lesa ha nithi wirodhi lesa wasiyak ho anugrahayak salasimen allas panathe 70 (i) waganthiya yatathe dushanayak sidukara athi bawata withthikaruwanta erehiwa mehi chodana gonu kara atha.
